name: Hartman's Briney Breezes Motel

reviews.text: This is the second time we have been to Hartman’s. My family has had a wonderful time 2 years in a row. The children play all day long. I was able to relax by the pool and the beach. My husband played golf and took the kids fishing. The available barbeques make it such a friendly atmosphere. The large courtyard is a great place for the kids to play kickball or wiffle-ball or just hang out.
reviews.title: Hartman's is fantastic!

reviews.text: The accommodations were great, spacious, very nice and clean. The kitchen with all of the necessary supplies makes it so much easier to afford a family vacation. Rob and Jenny were very friendly helpful, they made us feel at home. We will continue this family vacation every year and plan to bring more friends next year. WE LOVED IT!
reviews.title: LOVED BRINEY BREEZES

reviews.text: My family and I had a wonderful time. My kids swam and played all day long, they didn't want to leave. I got to relax by the pool and the beach, while my husband played golf and went fishing.
reviews.title: Best family fun getaway

likes.disliked: — couldn't find a corkscrew in the room

reviews.text: The accomodations were great, spacious,very nice and clean. The staff was great especially Rob and Jenny, they made us feel at home. This is going to be a yearly trip, we LOVED IT!!!
reviews.title: Loved Hartman's

reviews.text: Our original plan was for 3 nights, but immediately upon arrival fell in love and stayed for 5. The rooms are CLEAN and BIG. (We stayed in a studio...the kitchen was great...full refrigerator, freezer, stove, pots, pans, etc.). The beach is right across the street for easy access back and forth. The pool is a great attraction, also clean, and heated. The managers, Rob and Jen were always happy and helpful. My 3 kids can't wait to go back...and neither can we!!!
reviews.title: A true family getaway
Awesome Montauk Vacation Destination!
reviews.text: This Motel is incredible! We stayed for 4 days in early April and truly enjoyed ourselves. The accommodations are comfortable , spacious equipped with a kitchen so we can bring along our groceries and snacks for the kids. The rooms all have a view of the breathtaking Atlantic Ocean! We travelled with our 7 year old triplets who had such a good time on the property with their rollerblades, scooters and baseball gear. The Managers of the property were so great and knowledgable of the Montauk area and made sure we had a good time. The beach is a walk down the dunes and the heated pool is a plus for when we go back this Summer! We could not have asked for a more comfortable easy get-away for our family! Definitely check it out!

We love Montauk and have been staying at Hartman's Briney Breezes for many years. We just returned from our most recent visit. The location of this motel, across the street from the beach, is perfect and the views from the rooms are beautiful. The rooms are spotless, roomy and updated. What really keeps us coming back though, are the current managers, Rob and Jenny. They are the best! They are consistently professional, friendly and responsive. They always make us feel welcome (very important to us) and are the perfect hosts, including providing the latest information on what is new in Montauk. We highly recommend this motel to anyone looking for a fun, peaceful and carefree retreat in a beautiful setting.
reviews.title: The Best!

reviews.text: My husband and I, with our 2 small children stayed at Hartman's Briney Breezes the first weekend in October. It was a great family weekend. The view was spectacular from our 2nd floor room. The accommodations were neat, clean, and everything you needed was right there. Jen and Rob were very helpful with directing us to what was a perfect family get away. We definitely will be making Hartman's BB a regular family event.
reviews.title: Great View-Wonderful Family Getaway!!!
Great Columbus Day Weekend...
reviews.text: Our family stayed here from Fri. - Sun. and had a great time.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was our first time at Briney Breezes and hopefully not the last.
reviews.title: Great ocean views, but not much else

likes.disliked: — Needs major renovation, old and disgusting

reviews.text: My family has been traveling to Montauk for the past 11 years. When possible we always stay at Briney Breezes. The management and staff have always been accomodating and curtious. I have been there with my children, friends, and family and have always had a fabulous time. The rooms have always been clean. The heated pool is always a plus with plenty of seating.Having weber grills at your disposal is great..... Love it.....
reviews.title: Always a pleasure

likes.liked: — The room set up plenty of space

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I have been staying at Briney Breezes for the past 12 years. We stay their at least 3 to 4 times a year for vacation and weekend getaways. We enjoy our stay so much that each year we bring more and more people with us. This place is clean, clean, clean!!!! Rob and Jen, as well as their staff, are very hospitable and very much accomodating. It's a very family oriented place. The heated pool is great, there's plenty of grassy area for the children to play & romp, access to the deck from each room is an appreciated extra affording great views of the ocean & extended living area for those times when you want to just stay in. When you're there it feels like home away from home. I recommend Hartman's Briney Breezes to EVERYONE!!!!!
reviews.title: A Must in Montauk

reviews.text: My family and I just returned from a 3 night stay at this motel. We have been visiting Montauk for at least 10 years. First, let me start out by saying that the manager/owner of this place is downright nasty. We met other family members in Montauk and didn't think it would be a problem if someone were to drop by for dinner. Apparantly, this was a problem for Rob. Also, we only received 3 towels, we are a 4 person family. When we asked Rob to please send some towels, they never arrived. I have two small children under the age of 5 and I could not let them walk on the carpet barefoot because it was so filthy that it turned the soles of their feet black. They were also ants crawling up two of the walls.
reviews.title: DIRTY SLEAZES

likes.liked: — The barbecues that were available for our use.

reviews.text: The brochure states that the place is newly renovated. These brochures must be at least 10 years old. The air conditioner also didn't work well. And the water in the shower only stayed hot for 10 minutes. Not nearly long enough for an entire family to shower. I would not reccomend this place nor would I EVER stay here again. Recently, this past May we stayed at the Beachcomber, and would highly recommend this place. It is immaculate. We would have stayed there this time if they had any vacancies.
reviews.title: Exactly what we hoped for

likes.disliked: — Longer walk from downtown thatn I had hoped

reviews.text: I booked this hotel after reading the other reviews on this website. When I called the manager to book he was able to give me the actual room that they had pictured on their website. The room was newly updated, very clean and exactly as described. The pool was the cleanest hotel pool I've ever seen, and for the first time in many years I actually went for a swim in a hotel pool. The beach across the street was gorgeous, and we could see a bit of it from the room. The manager made several restaurant recommendations that turned out to be exactly what we were looking for. The walk downtown was longer than I thought it would be and too dark to do at night. When some loudmouths checked in and threatened to dominate the peace on our second day the manager was very tuned into it. Don't know exactly what happened but they were gone the next day. I don't think anyone even had a chance to complain! No telephones in the rooms, but I guess if you have a cell it doesn't matter. Have stayed in the Montauk Manor in the past, and while I love it for its elegance, we spent much more time at the beach this time because we were so close. Have also stayed at the Albatross and that experience has made me realize there are some very expensive dumps in Montauk and you have to be careful. I'd absolutely come back to Hartman's.
reviews.title: Would recommend staying here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We wish we found this motel when our kids were young. We feel that anyone with children would love Briney Breezes. The kitchen was well stocked with dishes etc. There are BBQ's all over the premises & families were all busy using them. The pool is clean and enough lounge chairs for everyone. Here is our only negative: If you are senior ciitizens (which we are) the walk to the ocean, carrying your chairs, may be too strenuous. If you are in a lower unit be prepared to hear the noises from above. However, even with those 2 negatives, we had a wonderful, relaxing 3 days.
reviews.title: Great for Families

reviews.text: Me and my family stayed at Hartmans for 5 nites the only bad experience was having to leave. Its Clean, Kid friendly, Fresh new rooms not your typical 70's vintage like found out here. Manager was very friendly as were the staff. The grounds are well kept and the pool area was clean. This motel is a keeper for my family book it early because it fills up quickly with repeat familys year after year
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: My family and I have been getting to Montauk several times a year for the last 10 to 12 years. We used to enjoy staying at different places during different stays. Then about 5-6 years ago we happened across the Briney Breeze and have not booked anywhere else since. The place is a paradise away from home.
reviews.title: By far the best place in Montauk

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stay there 4 to 5 times a season and we are always blown away.....it just keeps getting better. Rob the manager is always making improvements. You go into the same room you stayed in a year ago and its always improved upon. New carpet, new furniture its always somthing new.The staff is always going out of there way to make our stay perfect.....and there really good at it. My familly and I will be heading out there soon (today), we're already booked for August and September and will proberly squeeze at least one more visit in as well.
reviews.title: Hartman's Briney Breezes Motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: GREAT PLACE, GREAT PEOPLE, GREAT FUN.
reviews.title: really good, but overpriced

description: Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean's clean white sandy beaches you will relax and enjoy a spectacular ocean view from all 44 1 and 2 room efficiencies, with A/C Heat, HBO and a balcony to sit and unwind. Outdoor heated pool, Barbecues,short walk to the village and Tee Times at Montauk Downs.
